subject: Re: [junit] Re: JavaDocs
msgSnippet: ... What information in the JavaDoc do you find more valuable: the class intent and method signatures or the comments added for each method? Mike -- Mike
messageBody:
Shane Duan wrote:

>
> Second, I do find it a lot more pleasant to clicking through the html
> files rather than open up the source files to understand certain things.
> I do agree that making the code and document in sync. is a hassle, though.
>

What information in the JavaDoc do you find more valuable: the class' intent and method signatures or the comments added for each method?

Mike
